Package arcade.vis

Class Panel.Panel2D

java.lang.Object
arcade.vis.Panel
arcade.vis.Panel.Panel2D
Enclosing class:
Panel
public static class Panel.Panel2D
extends Panel
Extension of Panel for 2D display.

Panel2D uses the Display2D class from the MASON library.

  • Constructor Details

    • Panel2D

      public Panel2D​(java.lang.String title, int x, int y, int w, int h, Visualization vis)
      Creates a Panel for 2D display.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the panel
      x - the x position of the panel in pixels
      y - the y position of the panel in pixels
      w - the width of the panel in pixels
      h - the height of the panel in pixels
      vis - the visualization instance
